Im having the same problem as Aleksino, need help please!!!!!!

1 » RUN AVATAR - THE GAME.7zip.exe AND EXTRACT IN THE MAIN FOLDER
2 » MOVE THE EXTRACTED FOLDER TO THE DESKTOP
3 » START THE GAME IN THE NEXT PATH : bin\Avatar.exe

4 Launch game select manual activation
5. Copy ID & go to crack folder open key-gen
6. past id in id field click generate
7. copy serial & paste in serial field
